data.title: About
data.meta_description: Santa Cruz Wedding and Portrait Photographer
data.text:
Rebecca Stark, Photographer

Creativity runs in my family, so I knew I had to unleash my creativity in some form or another. I fell in love with photography at an early age with the first click, pic, and print.

I didn't just "pick up" the art of photography. I've trained in studio portraiture as well as photojournalism. Plus, I continue to learn new techniques by attending photography workshops to hone my craft.

When we have a shoot, I like to get to know you first, find out what locations you have in mind, and focus on posing & lighting during your session, so you look your absolute best.

With over 15 years of experience photographing weddings, portraits, and events, my photos will make you look as radiant as you are in real life. My style is eclectic yet flexible. So let's have fun capturing the true you.

I'm glad you found me!

Give me a call or

shoot me an email.

I'd love to chat about your session. : )
